text:
="preserve">Leonor Piuza (born 14 April 1978) is a Mozambican runner. She is best in the 800 meter runs.
Piuza won the gold medal at the 2007 All-Africa Games and finished sixth at the 2008 African Championships. She also competed at the 2006 Commonwealth Games.
Piuza's personal best time is 2:01.71 minutes. She got this in June 2007 in Villefranche-sur-Saône.
